Text: It's a zip, so it's crap.
Deznaj moron... of course it's a zip... easier to contain.. dumbass...
Easier for who?  Not for downloaders.
I don't need your crap and zip files are ridiculous. MPEG files are already compressed jackass!!!!!

You people DEFENDING zipping movies and pictures: Get the facts straight, morons. It makes you have to download the whole thing before you can see anything AND it saves maybe a MB or two in total. Not worth it.
I do agree with the sentiment about zip and rar files. However, I DO APPRECIATE that you uploaded it in the first place. So thank you.
